# pi-extensions

> Monorepo of TypeScript extensions for the Pi coding agent. Extensions enhance Pi with workflow management, output condensation, and code review capabilities.

This repository contains three Pi coding agent extensions built with TypeScript/ESM. Each extension follows a standard structure with src/, docs/, dist/, install.sh, and uninstall.sh.

## Extensions

- [delta](extensions/delta/docs/README.md): Phase-gate workflow extension for structured development (requirements → design → plan → implement ↔ test → review → deliver)
- [mu](extensions/mu/docs/README.md): Condenses tool call/result output in Pi transcript while preserving full outputs for LLM context
- [theta](extensions/theta/docs/README.md): Code review extension using critique for visual diff sharing

## Documentation

- [README](README.md): Repository overview and installation instructions
- [AGENTS](AGENTS.md): Instructions for AI coding agents working on this codebase
- [delta/ARCHITECTURE](extensions/delta/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): Delta extension technical architecture
- [mu/ARCHITECTURE](extensions/mu/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): Mu extension technical architecture
- [theta/CHANGELOG](extensions/theta/docs/CHANGELOG.md): Theta extension changelog
